entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (talus_dearic_droid.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: Your Master is dead. The experiment is a failure.
entries.s_13: That cannot be! Before these creatures came he was just fine.
entries.s_15: These creatures killed him. They are going to kill everyone on Talus if you do not help me!
entries.s_17: You have the information. You should use it on master's terminal.
entries.s_22: I...I do not want that. I don't believe that was master's intent.
entries.s_24: Then please give me the password to his terminal.
entries.s_28: Good work. You've served your master well.
entries.s_32: I have been instructed not to assist intruders.
entries.s_7: I'm here to shut down this facility.
entries.s_9: I cannot allow that. My master expressly stated I was to protect his work.
